title: Augmented Singedâ€™s run animation is bugged
body: Ever since the last update, he walks like he’s pigeon toed, which makes it very distracting to play with. It’s frustrating, because it’s my favorite skin for him.

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

Thanks for the report! You should see a fix for this in 7.20. :)

I am french, and i am a main Singed. In fact, they put the animation of the new Singed Skin "beekeeper" to all Singed Skin. Which create a tons of bugs. Like, with the Dark Scourge, the head pass throught his shield when he run, the animation of the Augmented skin is totally bugged, the "Surf" skin too.

I report the bug, I hope they will correct this very soon.
